summary.description:
Software to align short reads produced by a short read genome sequencer to a reference genome. It performs brute force alignment using a variant on the "bitap" algorithm that aligns several thousand reads to a reference in parallel. It uses bit-parallelism, multiple processors, and Cell SPUs if available.
It will find alignments with any number of errors up to a user specified cutoff. The emphasis is on doing a 100% accurate search as fast as is possible.
summary.name: Myrialign
